at0000.1.1.description: Document to communicate information to others about any stand-alone procedure or operation performed.
Dokument for å kommunisere informasjon om enkeltstående prosedyrer eller operasjoner som er utført.
Documento para comunicar informações aos outros sobre qualquer procedimento isolado ou operação executada.
Ein Dokument, um Informationen über jedes eigenständige Verfahren oder jeden durchgeführten Vorgang zu übermitteln.

at0000.1.description: Series of questions and associated answers used to screen for issues, problems or diagnoses.

at0034.1.description: The context or reason for screening.
at0034.1.comment:
This data element is intended to provide collection context for the question/answer groups when queried at a later date. It is not expected that this data element will be exposed to the individual, but only stored in data.
For example: pre-admission screening or the name of the actual questionnaire.

at0004.1.description: Identification of an issue, problem or diagnosis, or grouping of issues, problems or diagnoses, by name.
at0004.1.comment: Coding of the 'Problem/diagnosis name' with a terminology is preferred, where possible.

at0040.1.description: Indication of timing related to the issue, problem or diagnosis.
at0040.1.comment: The 'Timing' data element has deliberately been loosely modelled to support the myriad of ways that it can be used in questionnaires to capture when an issue, problem or diagnosis occured. The specific and intended semantics can be further clarified in a template. For example: the actual date and/or time; the start and stop time for when the issue, problem or diagnosis occured; the interval of time during which the issue, problem or diagnosis occured; the duration of the issue, problem or diagnosis; the age of the individual at the time of the issue, problem or diagnosis; or the duration of time since it occurred. A partial date is valid, using the DV_DATE_TIME data type, to record only a year.

at0000.1.description: Spørsmål og tilhørende svar som brukes til å kartlegge bekymringer, plager, problemer eller diagnoser.

at0034.1.comment: Dette dataelementet er ment for å sette en kontekst for spørsmålene, dersom man senere ønsker å gjøre spørringer på dataene. Det er ikke forventet at dette dataelementet skal være synlig for en bruker av skjemaet, men kun tilgjengelig i de lagrede dataene. For eksempel: "Preoperativ screening" eller navnet på det faktiske spørreskjemaet.

at0004.1.description: Navnet på en bekymring, plage, problem eller diagnose, eller grupper av bekymringer, plager, problemer eller diagnoser.
at0004.1.comment: Koding av problem/diagnosenavnet med en terminologi foretrekkes, der det er mulig.

at0040.1.description: Tidsangivelsen for bekymringen, plagen, problemet eller diagnosen.
at0040.1.comment: Dataelementet "Tidsangivelse" er med hensikt løst modellert for å støtte ulike måter å angi tidsangivelser for bekymringen, plagen, problemet eller diagnosen i et spørreskjema. Den konkrete semantikken defineres i templatet. For eksempel: Bekymringen, plagen, problemet eller diagnosen faktiske dato og/eller klokkeslett, start- og slutttid for bekymringen, plagen, problemet eller diagnosen, et tidsintervall for når bekymringen, plagen, problemet eller diagnosen oppstod, varigheten av bekymringen, plagen, problemet eller diagnosen, individets alder på tidspunktet for bekymringen, plagen, problemet eller diagnosen, eller hvor lenge det siden det oppstod. Kan være en deldato, for eksempel bare år, ved å bruke datatypen DV_DATE_TIME.

at0000.1.description: Eine Reihe von Fragen und zugehörigen Antworten, die zum Screening auf Vorhandensein von Beschwerden, Problemen oder Diagnosen verwendet werden.
at0000.1.comment: Die Antworten können selbst berichtet werden.

at0034.1.description: Der Kontext oder Grund für das Screening.
at0034.1.comment:
Dieses Datenelement soll bei einer späteren Abfrage den Erhebungskontext für die Frage/Antwort-Gruppen bereitstellen. Es wird nicht erwartet, dass dieses Datenelement der Person belichtet wird, sondern nur in Daten gespeichert wird. 
Zum Beispiel: Screening vor der Aufnahme oder der Name des eigentlichen Fragebogens.

at0004.1.description: Identifizierung einer Beschwerde, eines Problems, einer Diagnose oder einer Gruppe von Beschwerden, Problemen, Beschwerden, namentlich.
at0004.1.comment: Kodierung von "Name des Problems/ der Diagnose" mit einer Terminologie wird nach Möglichkeit bevorzugt.

at0040.1.description: *Indication of timing related to the issue, problem or diagnosis. (en)
at0040.1.comment: *The 'Timing' data element has deliberately been loosely modelled to support the myriad of ways that it can be used in questionnaires to capture when an issue, problem or diagnosis occured. The specific and intended semantics can be further clarified in a template. For example: the actual date and/or time; the start and stop time for when the issue, problem or diagnosis occured; the interval of time during which the issue, problem or diagnosis occured; the duration of the issue, problem or diagnosis; the age of the individual at the time of the issue, problem or diagnosis; or the duration of time since it occurred. A partial date is valid, using the DV_DATE_TIME data type, to record only a year. (en)

at0000.1.description: *Series of questions and associated answers used to screen for issues, problems or diagnoses. (en)

at0034.1.comment:
This data element is intended to provide collection context for the question/answer groups when queried at a later date. It is not expected that this data element will be exposed to the individual, but only stored in data.
For example: pre-admission screening or the name of the actual questionnaire.(en)

at0004.1.description: Name of a problem or diagnosis; or grouping of problems or diagnoses.(en)
at0004.1.comment: *Coding of the Problem/Diagnosis name with a terminology is preferred, where possible.(en)

at0040.1.description: *Indication of timing related to the issue, problem or diagnosis. (en)
at0040.1.comment: *The 'Timing' data element has deliberately been loosely modelled to support the myriad of ways that it can be used in questionnaires to capture when an issue, problem or diagnosis occured. The specific and intended semantics can be further clarified in a template. For example: the actual date and/or time; the start and stop time for when the issue, problem or diagnosis occured; the interval of time during which the issue, problem or diagnosis occured; the duration of the issue, problem or diagnosis; the age of the individual at the time of the issue, problem or diagnosis; or the duration of time since it occurred. A partial date is valid, using the DV_DATE_TIME data type, to record only a year. (en)

author.name: Marit Alice Venheim, Silje Ljosland Bakke, John Tore Valand
author.organisation: Helse Vest IKT, Helse Vest IKT AS, Helse Bergen

at0000.1.description: A atividade clínica realizada para rastreamento , investigação , diagnóstico , cura , terapêutica, avaliação ou finalidade paliativos.
*A clinical activity carried out for screening, investigative, diagnostic, curative, therapeutic, evaluative or palliative purposes.(en)
A clinical activity carried out for screening, investigative, diagnostic, curative, therapeutic, evaluative or palliative purposes.
*A clinical activity carried out for screening, investigative, diagnostic, curative, therapeutic, evaluative or palliative purposes.(en)
*A clinical activity carried out for screening, investigative, diagnostic, curative, therapeutic, evaluative or palliative purposes.(en)
En klinisk aktivitet som er utført i undersøkende, diagnostisk, kurativ, terapeutisk, evaluerende, prognostisk eller palliativ hensikt.
Una actividad clínica llevada a cabo para la detección, investigación, diagnóstico, curativos, terapéuticos, de evaluación o con fines paliativos.
Eine klinische Aktivität, die zur Früherkennung, Untersuchung, Diagnose, Heilung, Therapie, Bewertung oder in Hinsicht auf palliative Maßnahmen durchgeführt wird.
En klinisk aktivitet utförd för screening, undersökande, diagnostiska, botande, terapeutiska, utvärderande eller palliativa ändamål.

*A clinical activity carried out for screening, investigative, diagnostic, curative, therapeutic, evaluative or palliative purposes.(en)
En klinisk aktivitet som er utført i undersøkende, diagnostisk, kurativ, terapeutisk, evaluerende, prognostisk eller palliativ hensikt.

author.name: Alan March
author.organisation: Hospital Universitario Austral, Buenos Aires, Argentina

at0000.1.description: Narrative summary or overview about a patient, specifically from the perspective of a healthcare provider, and with or without associated interpretations.

at0002.1.description: The summary, assessment, conclusions or evaluation of the clinical findings.

at0000.1.description: خلاصه یا مروری تشریحی دربازه بیمار بویژه از نظز ارایه کننده مراقبت بهداشتی با یا بدون تفسیرهای مربوطه

at0002.1.description: خلاصه ، ارزیابی ، نتیجه ، یا ارزشیابی یافته های بالینی

at0000.1.description: ملخص بالرواية أو نظرة عامة عن المريض, خاصة من وجهة نظر مقدم الخدمة الصحية, مع إرفاق أو عدم إرفاق تفسيرات

at0002.1.description: الملخص, التقييم, الاستنتاجات أو التقييم للموجودات السريرية

at0000.1.description: Zusammenfassung oder Übersicht einer Patientengeschichte, speziell aus der Sicht eines Gesundheitsdienstleisters, evtl. mit dazugehörigen Interpretationen.

at0002.1.description: Die Zusammenfassung, Beurteilung, Aussagen or Auswertung des klinischen Befunds.

at0000.1.description: Sumario narrativo o visión global acerca de un paciente, específicamente desde la perspectiva de un profesional del cuidado de la salud, con o sin interpretaciones asociadas.

at0002.1.description: El sumario, la impresión diagnóstica y las conclusiones sobre los hallazgos clínicos.

at0000.1.description: Resumo narrativo ou visão geral sobre um paciente, especificamente a partir da perspectiva de um profissional de saúde, e com ou sem interpretações associadas.

at0002.1.description: O sumário, a avaliação, conclusões ou avaliação dos achados clínicos.

at0000.1.description: 从医疗保健服务提供着的角度，手工综合并记录关于患者的叙述型摘要或概述，且带有或没有相关联的解释。

at0002.1.description: 对于临床所见（临床发现）进行的概括、评估、总结或评价。

at0000.1.description: Fritekstsammendrag eller oversikt om en pasient fra helsepersonellets perspektiv, med eller uten tilhørende fortolkninger.

at0002.1.description: Oppsummering, vurdering, konklusjoner eller evaluering av de kliniske funnene.

at0000.1.description: Beskrivande sammanfattning eller överblick av en patient, särskilt ur vårdgivarens perspektiv, med eller utan associerade tolkningar.

at0002.1.description: Sammanfattning, bedömning, slutsatser eller utvärderingar av de kliniska fynden.

author.name: Nadim Anani

translations.accreditation: fluent in both English and German, Medical Informatics 'MSc' degree from Heidelberg, 2 years professional experience in health informatics, some translation experience, openEHR knowledge.
